cab.content: I&ilitary Secret,718 From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary, of State for India, 30th March 1918. (Received 31st, at 11 a.ra.) 3881; Marri situation. On evening of 23rd March Dnki Force readiedKohlu unopposed. In this area some headmen gave themselves up. Enemygathering at Kalian was bombed on morning of 24th March. On 23rd Marchand 24th March, near Barkhan, we carried out punitive measures againstvillages implicated in looting of that place.
